results.name: Peter Morley

roles_in_work.title: The Alcoholic: study of a disease
Better ways. 4. One man and his job

results.biography: Peter Morley, OBE (26 June 1924 – 23 June 2016) was a German-born British television producer and documentary filmmaker. As a nine-year-old child, he fled Nazi Germany with his elder siblings and moved to England, where he lived until his death. He made several documentaries about the Holocaust, winning several awards, both in Britain and abroad.
